snippet.title: Serial Cleaners Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
Exclusive first look at gameplay from the new game Serial Cleaners. 

Serial Cleaner is a story-driven, fast-paced stealth/action game, set in 1970s America. You are a professional cleaner. Your job is to clean up murder scenes by disposing of bodies, cleaning up blood stains and hiding incriminating evidence.
